text: Skënder Sallaku (25 January 1935 - 11 February 2014) was an Albanian actor and comedian from Tirana. He is a recipient of the People's Artist of Albania award. Sallaku died on 11 February 2014 at a hospital in his hometown of Tirana. He was aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from Tirana Category:Movie actors Category:Comedians Category:Albanian actors
title: Skënder Sallaku
